```{python}
import os
import pandas as pd
import requests

url = "https://drive.usercontent.google.com/download?id=1V2GCHGt2dkFGqVBeoUFckU4IhUgk4ocQ&authuser=1"

local = "data/lightcast_job_postings.csv"
os.makedirs(os.path.dirname(local), exist_ok=True)

#Download if missing
if not os.path.exists(local):
    print("Local file not found—downloading from URL…")
    response = requests.get(url, stream=True)
    response.raise_for_status()
    print("Download complete.")
df = pd.read_csv(local)
print(f"Loaded {len(df):,} rows from Lightcast data")
```
